name: Neebing Roadhouse
text:
Add side fries to any app for $3.50
or side poutine $5.00
or side salad $4.00
or onion rings $4.00
or sweet fries $4.50

Garlic Shrimp - 6 shrimp swimming in garlic butter and baked with a blend of mixed cheese. Served with garlic bread - $16.95

Popcorn Shrimp - A basket of Chipotle Mango seasoned popcorn shrimp. Served with House made Torpedo sauce - $13.95

THAI BITES - Fried chicken breast bites tossed in Sweet Thai sauce topped with chow mien noodles and green onion and sesame seeds - $15.50

Buffalo Chicken Dip - Spicy Chicken & Cream Cheese Bake served with Tortilla Chips - $15.95

Dill Pickle Chips - Fried crisp and served with Cajun aioli - $11.95

Dry Ribs - Lightly dusted Pork ribs fried to a crispy golden brown. Served with Lemon and Cajun Aioli - $13.95

Neebing Firebombs - A Neebing original is back! Jalapeños, bacon, and cheese, mixed into a potato hash. Fried crisp and served with sriracha and Cajun Aioli - $11.95

Bruschetta - Toasted garlic flat bread topped with house made bruschetta, feta cheese and balsamic glaze - $12.95

Fish Tacos - Beer-battered pickerel filet, pineapple-cilantro slaw, pico de gallo, sriracha glaze, three warm flour tortillas - $14.95

Crispy Cauliflower - Served with your choice of sauce. Mild, medium, hot, honey garlic, Chefs blend, Baton Rouge, Sweet chili or creamy garlic parm - $14.95

Cheese Curds - Beer soaked mozza curds battered and fried - $13.95

WINGS

CLASSIC WINGS - Thick & juicy wings served with carrot sticks and your choice of ranch or blue cheese dip.

1 pound 14.95
2 pounds 28.95

Mango Habanero Dill Pickle Salt And Vinegar

CHEESE NACHOS 17.95

Loaded with bacon, cheese, diced tomatoes, jalapeños and green onions 20.95

Our Ultimate nachos with BBQ pulled pork 22.95
BUFFALO CHICKEN NACHOS

Loaded with bacon, cheese, jalapeños, green onions and our signature buffalo chicken dip 23.95
Awesome POUTINES with a Twist!

CLASSIC

Hand cut fries topped with cheese curds and mozzarella smothered with gravy 11.95
ULTIMATE

The classic with bacon and green onions and Jalapeños 14.95
PULLED PORK

The classic with bbq pulled pork, bacon and green onions 15.95
BUFFALO CHICKEN

Grilled chicken breast, buffalo dip, green onions, bacon and jalapeños 16.95

Fresh Soups & Salads

SOUP du JOUR: $5.95

FRENCH ONION SOUP: $9.50

French bread sliced and grilled golden brown.
without cheese: 1 slice 1.95 3 slice 5.95
with cheese: 1 slice 2.75 3 slice 7.45
NEEBING'S ALL INCLUSIVE: $12.95

Daily soup, garlic toast and choice of side Caesar or Neebing greens. Sub French onion soup 16.95
CAESAR SALAD: Full size 14.00 ½ size 8.95

Add chicken Breast 7.00
Add half a dozen shrimp 7.00
BLACKENED CHICKEN CAESAR SALAD: $22.95

Served warm, with Blackened Chicken and sautéed peppers and onions. Sub blackened shrimp 22.95
SIRLOIN STEAK SALAD: $23.95

Fire grilled 5 oz AAA Canadian Sirloin. Served on baby greens with goat cheese, tomato, roasted red pepper and sweet red onion. Drizzled with Balsamic Glaze.
MEDITERRANEAN GREEK SALAD: $22.95

Cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, peppers and olives over Spring greens with Feta cheese. Your choice of Grilled or Crispy chicken. Served with a warm Pita Bread 22.95
sub shrimp 22.95
ORIENTAL CHICKEN SALAD: $21.95

Mixed greens topped with Crispy Asian noodles, toasted almonds, cucumber and carrot. Choice of Grilled or Crispy chicken 21.95 sub shrimp 21.95
Juicy Burgers

Our 6oz patties are made only from fresh AAA Canadian Angus Chuck. All Burgers are topped with lettuce, tomato and pickles.

Burgers Platters are served with choice of French Fries, Soup or Neebing Greens. Substitute Onion Rings, Sweet Potato Fries or Caesar for 3.50. Upgrade to French Onion Soup 4.00 Add gravy 2.00 Extra patty 5.00

CLASSIC BURGER: $16.00

add cheddar 1.50 add bacon 2.00
THE NEEBING BURGER: $19.95

40 years and counting. Topped with Black Forest ham, cheddar and fried onions.
THE RAGING BULL: $19.95

A spicy patty with jalapeños, bacon and cheddar
THE GHOST OF HIGHWAY 61: $21.95

A spicy patty with cheddar, bacon and our house made Ghost pepper-onion jam. Topped with an over easy egg (warning: this burger is VERY spicy!!)
HIGHWAY 61: $20.95

Cheddar, bacon, fried egg and frizzled onions
THE BIG ROADIE: $25.00

Double patty, double cheese, double bacon
BOURBON BLUE: $21.95

Topped with fried onions, bacon, bourbon and Dijon aioli and blue cheese
BLUEBERRY CHEVRE: $21.95

Blueberry compote, goat cheese, frizzed onions
ALPINE BURGER: $20.95

Mushrooms, fried onions, bacon and Swiss cheese
BEYOND BURGER: $19.95

A plant-based patty with crisp lettuce, tomato and pickles

Available after 5pm

We Use Fresh, Never Frozen Manitoba Poultry & Alberta AAA Beef

Served with your choice of fresh cut fries, Mashed potato or Baked potato (upgrade to loaded baked for 3.00) onion rings, sweet potato fries and Chef's Choice of vegetables.

Add side Dinner Greens or Caesar salad to any entree for 4.00

CLASSIC NEW YORK

AAA 12 oz. grilled to your specs 39.00
add sauteed shrimp 7.00, add mushrooms 4.00

Twin baked chicken breasts topped with a creamy white wine mushroom sauce 30.00
BAKED SALMON

Atlantic salmon filet baked with blueberry maple syrup 31.00
STUFFED YORKIE

10 oz of Braised prime rib, stuffed in a large Yorkshire pudding. Topped with red wine jus 26.00

12 oz cut AAA aged slow cooked prime rib served with Yorkshire au jus. (Available Thursday, Friday and Saturday after 5pm) 46.00
Tantalizing PASTA

Served with garlic bread

CHICKEN PARMESAN

COCKTAILS

Classic Cocktails

NEEBING CAESAR

Vodka, Motts Clamato, pickle & pickled green bean, rimmed with Irad. spices.
GREYHOUND

Hendricks Gin and grapefruit juice garnished with an orange slice.
WHISKEY SOUR

Rye, lemon juice, simple syrup & bitters
MOSCOW MULE

Vodka, Ginger Beer, lime juice, garnished with a lime wedge.

* White rum, raspberry vodka, muddled mint, raspberries, club soda, simple syrup.

POMEGRANATE MARGARITA
* Tequila, Triple Sec, lime juice, pomegranate juice. Served in a sugar rimmed glass.

CUCUMBER FIZZ
* Gordon's gin, club soda, lemonade, mint & cucumber

PASSION PUNCH
